alert.note: Alert for Benton; Washington (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 05 at 5:51AM CDT until April 05 at 6:30AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 AM CDT FOR WESTERN BENTON...CENTRAL WASHINGTON AND NORTHEASTERN ADAIR COUNTIES... At 550 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 4 miles south of Springtown to near Westville, moving northeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... Fayetteville... Springdale... Rogers... Bentonville... Siloam Springs... Stilwell... Bella Vista... Lowell... Farmington... Prairie Grove... Elkins... Tontitown... Lincoln... Cave Springs... Westville... Greenland... Highfill... Watts... Springtown... Adair State Park... This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 56 and 93. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until noon CDT for northwestern Arkansas...and northeastern Oklahoma. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
